BaseUpgrade.Name: Increase Core Focus
BaseUpgrade.Description: [H4]Increase Core Focus[h4] Please see page 83 of the Far Horizons Sourcebook for details.

BaseUpgrade.Name: Improve Security
BaseUpgrade.Description: [H4]Improve Security[h4] Please see page 83 of the Far Horizons Sourcebook for details.

Option.Name: Electronic Locks
Option.Description: All buildings (or doors within the space station) gain electronic locks that can only be broken with a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b].

Option.Name: Security Droid
Option.Description: The homestead gains a security droid.

AdvAbility.Name: Droid
AdvAbility.Description: Does not need to breathe, eat, or drink and can survive in vacuum or underwater. Immune to poisons or toxins.

Option.Name: Reinforced Fence/Shields
Option.Description: The homestead gains reinforced fences around the main buildings, or if it is a space station, it gains shields granting it defense 1.

Option.Name: Security Cameras
Option.Description: The homestead gains security cameras that can be accessed from a central control room.

BaseUpgrade.Name: NPC Ally
BaseUpgrade.Description: [H4]NPC Ally[h4] Please see page 83 of the Far Horizons Sourcebook for details.

Option.Name: Merchant NPC
Option.Description: The homestead gains an NPC merchant. He can obtain and sell any legal or Restricted item with a modified rarity of 5 or lower to the party.

Option.Name: Doctor NPC
Option.Description: The homestead gains an NPC doctor. He has medical supplies allowing him to perform Medicine checks without penalty.

Option.Name: Mechanic NPC
Option.Description: The homestead gains an NPC mechanic who can repair items, droids, and starships and vehicles. He has a tool kit allowing him to perform Mechanics checks without penalty.

Option.Name: Pilot NPC
Option.Description: The homestead gains an NPC pilot who can pilot ground or space vehicles for the party.

BaseUpgrade.Name: Infirmary
BaseUpgrade.Description: [H4]Infirmary[h4] Please see page 83 of the Far Horizons Sourcebook for details.

BaseUpgrade.Name: Mechanic's Garage
BaseUpgrade.Description: [H4]Mechanic's Garage[h4] Please see page 83 of the Far Horizons Sourcebook for details.

BaseUpgrade.Name: Landing Bay
BaseUpgrade.Description: [H4]Landing Bay[h4] Please see page 83 of the Far Horizons Sourcebook for details.

BaseUpgrade.Name: Increase Core Focus
BaseUpgrade.Description: [H4]Increase Core Focus[h4] Please see page 85 of the Far Horizons Sourcebook for details.

BaseUpgrade.Name: Improve Security
BaseUpgrade.Description: [H4]Improve Security[h4] Please see page 85 of the Far Horizons Sourcebook for details.

Option.Name: Electronic Locks
Option.Description: All buildings gain electronic locks that can only be broken with a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b].

Option.Name: Security Droid
Option.Description: The business gains a security droid.

AdvAbility.Name: Droid
AdvAbility.Description: Does not need to breathe, eat, or drink and can survive in vacuum or underwater. Immune to poisons or toxins.

Option.Name: Reinforced Material
Option.Description: The business's main buildings are constructed of heavily reinforced material, giving it an armor value of 2.

Option.Name: Security Cameras
Option.Description: The business gains security cameras that can be accessed from a central control room.

BaseUpgrade.Name: Special Orders
BaseUpgrade.Description: [H4]Special Orders[h4] Please see page 85 of the Far Horizons Sourcebook for details.

BaseUpgrade.Name: Wholesale Prices

BaseUpgrade.Name: Increase Core Focus

BaseUpgrade.Name: Enhanced Security
BaseUpgrade.Description: [H4]Enhanced Security[h4] Please see page 88 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

Option.Name: Electronic Locks
Option.Description: All buildings (or doors within the space station) gain electronic locks that can only be broken with a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b].

Option.Name: Reinforced Armor
Option.Description: The base gains an armor value of 2.

Option.Name: Reinforced Shields
Option.Description: The base gains reinforced fences, granting it defense 2 against weapon attacks from outside.

Option.Name: Security Cameras
Option.Description: The base gains security cameras that can be accessed from a central control room.

Option.Name: Main Entrance Turret
Option.Description: The base gains a heavy repeating blaster turret that covers the main entrance.

BaseUpgrade.Name: NPC Ally
BaseUpgrade.Description: [H4]NPC Ally[h4] Please see page 89 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

Option.Name: Doctor NPC
Option.Description: An NPC doctor can heal characters at the base and treat ailments. He has medical supplies allowing him to perform Medicine checks without penalty.

Option.Name: Mechanic NPC
Option.Description: An NPC mechanic can repair items, droids, starships, and vehicles. He has a tool kit allowing him to perform Mechanics checks without penalty.

Option.Name: Pilot NPC
Option.Description: An NPC pilot can operate ground or space vehicles.
